name: Octopushead Wants Cake
description:
Little action rpg originally made in Game Maker, originally created for a class. (It's basically a glorified Demo in it's current form). I'm thinking of revamping it and making it in godot with new art, stages, and a more streamlined control scheme.

You control a kid with an octopus on his head who attacks with ink balls and tried to find cake.. it's gameplay is heavily inspired by The Binding of Isaac.


The Sprites were created by me, while the music was pulled from Resistor Anthems. A royalty free album collection made by Eric Skiff.
